name: Environment | DC Voltage Returned to Normal Range
description: DC voltage returned to normal range
subject_template: The DC voltage measured at {{name}}, returned to the normal range.{%if threshold %} {{threshold}} threshold exceeded.{% endif %}{% if measure %} The current state is {{measure}}. {% endif %}{% if min %} Min state is {{min}}. {% endif %}{% if max %} Max state is {{max}}. {% endif %}
